column4: ello, just installed the nvidia-glx drivers and i cant get 1152x864 @ 85hz even tho my horizsync and vertrefresh is the same as before, anyone know how to fix this?
sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf   manualy add the resolution you want to the list
yeah 1152x864 is already there under Display 24depth (24depth is my DefaultDepth)
best I could do , maybe someone else can help
